front.title: Control In-situ OAM Overhead with Segment IOAM

abstract.t: This document describes a proposal which partitions an in-situ OAM (iOAM) domain into multiple segments in order to control the iOAM data overhead, adapt to the path MTU limitations, and enable new applications. We discuss several use cases to motivate our proposal and base the necessary modifications on the current in-situ OAM header format specification.
